content:
Parameters monitored:

During the verification, all relevant monitoring parameters of the registered monitoring plan have been verified with regard to the appropriateness of the verification method; the correctness of the values applied for ER calculation, the accuracy and applied QA/QC measures. All monitoring parameters have been measured / determined without material

VCs

Verification Report: VCS Version 4.2

misstatements and are in line with all applicable standards and relevant requirements. It is confirmed that the monitoring mechanism is effective and reliable.

Verification team confirms through remote interviews/physical site visit and from the document review, the actual monitoring system complies with the monitoring plan mentioned in the registered validated VCS-PD /05/. According to the monitoring plan in the registered VCS-PD, there are 3 monitoring parameters required to be monitored.
